main event: An unidentified flying object resembling a comet was sighted in Colorado Springs, Colorado on December 17, 1957.
interesting points: The object had a reddish front and emitted sparks, It appeared to be the size of a pea and was bluish white in color, The sighting lasted for approximately 3 seconds, The initial analysis suggested it could be a balloon or aircraft, The observer was a civilian construction engineer who watched the object along with an Air Force lieutenant.
sighted object: comet-like object with reddish front and sparks
witness description: a civilian construction engineer and an Air Force lieutenant
